meanings.sent1: She wore a grovy dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The new shoes she bought were really grovy.
meanings.sent3: His grovy hat matched his cool sunglasses perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The grovy outfit she put together turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The grovy accessories completed her trendy look.

meanings.definition: Grovy (noun): a person who is fashionable or stylish
meanings.sent1: She is known as the grovy of our group.
meanings.sent2: He always dresses like a true grovy.
meanings.sent3: The grovy at the party caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: She is the ultimate grovy in the fashion world.
meanings.sent5: Being a grovy means always staying ahead of the trends.

meanings.definition: Grovy (verb): to make something fashionable or stylish
meanings.sent1: She knows how to grovy up any outfit.
meanings.sent2: He grovies his hair before going out.
meanings.sent3: They decided to grovy up their living room with new decorations.
meanings.sent4: The designer grovied the runway with their latest collection.
meanings.sent5: Her talent lies in grovying up old clothes into trendy pieces.
